name: White Room of Lies
description:
WHITE ROOM OF LIES

My first ever published game created for "The just f*king finish jam". The theme of this jam is "Illusion of choice".

A short narrative game that can be completed in less than 10 minutes. There are two endings available and one joke ending.

---Controls---

W, A, S D - to move

F - to interact

Space - to jump

Shift - to sprint
